data.name: Adhesive Explosive
data.desc: Before damage calculation, if this card was attacked by an opponent's monster and was in face-down Defense Position at the start of the Damage Step: Equip this card to the attacking monster. Then, during your opponent's next Standby Phase, destroy the monster this card is equipped to.

data.name: Ancient Gear
data.desc: If you control an "Ancient Gear", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-up Attack Position.

data.name: Ancient Gear Cannon
data.desc: You can Tribute this card; inflict 500 damage to your opponent, and if you do, neither player can activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase of this turn.

data.name: Ancient Gear Castle
data.desc: All "Ancient Gear" monsters gain 300 ATK. Each time a monster is Normal Summoned/Set, place 1 counter on this card. If you Tribute Summon an "Ancient Gear" monster face-up, you can Tribute this card instead, if the number of its counters is equal to or greater than the number of required Tribute(s).

data.name: Ancient Gear Drill
data.desc: If you control an "Ancient Gear" monster: Discard 1 card; Set 1 Spell Card directly from your Deck. This turn, that Spell Card cannot be activated.

data.name: Ancient Gear Factory
data.desc: Reveal 1 Level 5 or higher "Ancient Gear" monster from your hand, then banish a number of "Ancient Gear" monsters from your Graveyard, whose combined Levels are double the revealed monster's, and if you do, if you Normal Summon the revealed monster this turn, you must Normal Smmon it without Tributing.

data.name: Anteatereatingant
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 2 Spell or Trap Cards you control to the Graveyard. You can destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls. If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack during this turn.

data.name: Attack Reflector Unit
data.desc: Tribute 1 "Cyber Dragon". Special Summon 1 "Cyber Barrier Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

data.name: B.E.S. Covered Core
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, put 2 counters on it. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card attacks or is attacked, at the end of the Damage Step toss a coin and call it. If you call it wrong, remove 1 counter. If this card battles without a counter, destroy it at the end of the Damage Step.

data.name: Beelze Frog
data.desc: This card gains 300 ATK for each "T.A.D.P.O.L.E." in your Graveyard.

data.name: Chain Thrasher
data.desc: This card can attack 1 additional time during the same Battle Phase for each "Chain Thrasher" in your Graveyard.

data.name: Chainsaw Insect
data.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked or was attacked: Your opponent draws 1 card.

data.name: Cyber Barrier Dragon
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Attack Reflector Unit". Once per turn, while this card is in Attack Position, your opponent's next attack is negated.

data.name: Cyber Laser Dragon
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Photon Generator Unit". Once per turn, you can destroy 1 monster with ATK or DEF equal to or higher than the ATK of this card.

data.name: Cyclone Boomerang
data.desc: Equip only to "Elemental HERO Wildheart". It gains 500 ATK. When the equipped monster is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field, then inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each Spell/Trap Card destroyed by this effect.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: D.3.S. Frog
data.desc:
"Des Frog" + "Des Frog" + "Des Frog"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Treeborn Frog" in your Graveyard.

data.name: D.D. Guide
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, give control of it to your opponent. During each player's End Phase, your opponent selects 1 card from the Graveyard of this card's controller and removes it from play.

data.name: Damage Condenser
data.desc: When you take battle damage: Discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with ATK less than or equal to the battle damage you took, in face-up Attack Position.

card_sets.set_name: Saga of Blue-Eyes White Dragon Structure Deck

data.name: Demise, King of Armageddon
data.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "End of the World". You can pay 2000 LP; destroy all other cards on the field.

data.name: Disciple of the Forbidden Spell
data.desc: When this card is Summoned, declare different Monster Card Attributes equal to the number of "Disciple of the Forbidden Spell"(s) in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a monster that has a declared Attribute, destroy the monster with this card's effect without applying damage calculation.

data.name: Divine Dragon - Excelion
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, it gets 1 of the following effects for each "Divine Dragon - Excelion" in your Graveyard when this effect resolves (your choice). These effects cannot accumulate. ● This card gains 1000 ATK. ● If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row. ● When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

data.name: Doom Dozer
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 Insect-Type monsters from your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard.

data.name: Elemental HERO Neo Bubbleman
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending an "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" you control and "Metamorphosis" in your hand to the Graveyard. This card's name is treated as "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" while it is face-up on the field. Destroy an opponent's monster that battles this card at the end of the Damage Step.

data.name: End of the World
data.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Ruin, Queen of Oblivion" or "Demise, King of Armageddon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon.

data.name: Full Salvo
data.desc: When this card resolves, send your entire hand to the Graveyard. Inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each card you sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

data.name: Generation Shift
data.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; destroy that target, then add 1 card with the same name as the destroyed card from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Goblin Out of the Frying Pan
data.desc: Pay 500 Life Points. Negate the activation of a Spell Card and return it to the owner's hand.

data.name: Gokipon
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can add 1 Insect monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Ultimate Predators

data.name: Grass Phantom
data.desc: This card gains 500 ATK for each "Grass Phantom" in your Graveyard.

data.name: Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 face-up Continuous Spell Cards you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, monsters your opponent controls cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years

data.name: Hero Heart
data.desc: Target 1 face-up "Elemental HERO" monster you control; halve its ATK until the end of this turn, but it can attack twice during this turn's Battle Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Hero Kid
data.desc: When this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon any number of "Hero Kid"(s) from your Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Karma Cut
data.desc: Discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish that target, then banish all cards with the same name as that monster from your opponent's Graveyard.

card_sets.set_name: Premium Gold: Return of the Bling

data.name: Machine King Prototype
data.desc: This card gains 100 ATK and DEF for each Machine-Type monster on the field, except this card.

data.name: Magnet Circle LV2
data.desc: Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Machine-Type monster from your hand.

data.name: Malfunction
data.desc: Pay 500 Life Points. Negate the activation of a Trap Card and return it to its original position.

data.name: Malice Ascendant
data.desc: During your opponent's Standby Phase, send 1 card from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard for each "Malice Ascendant" in your Graveyard.

data.name: Memory Crusher
data.desc: If this card successfully attacks directly, inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each card in their Extra Deck.

data.name: Miracle Kids
data.desc: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; that target loses 400 ATK for each "Hero Kid" in your Graveyard, until the End Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Next to be Lost
data.desc: Select 1 face-up monster you control. Send 1 card from your Deck to the Graveyard with the same name as the selected card.

data.name: Option Hunter
data.desc: Activate only when a monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard. Gain Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

data.name: Parasitic Ticky
data.desc: The ATK and DEF of this card are each equal to the number of tokens on the field x 500.

data.name: Phantasmal Martyrs
data.desc: Activate only while you have 2 or more cards in your hand, and control a face-up "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" or "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder". Send your entire hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon 3 "Phantasmal Martyr Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Attack Position.

data.name: Photon Generator Unit
data.desc: Tribute 2 "Cyber Dragons". Special Summon 1 "Cyber Laser Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

data.name: Princess Curran
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

data.name: Princess Pikeru
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, gain 800 Life Points for each monster you control.

data.name: Proto-Cyber Dragon
data.desc: This card's name becomes "Cyber Dragon" while on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Raviel, Lord of Phantasms
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 Fiend-Type monsters, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If your opponent Normal Summons a monster(s): Special Summon 1 "Phantasm Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) for each monster Summoned, but it cannot declare an attack. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; this card gains ATK equal to the original ATK of the Tributed monster until the end of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years

data.name: Ruin, Queen of Oblivion
data.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "End of the World". When this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can activate this effect; this card can make a second attack in a row.

data.name: Saber Beetle
data.desc: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

data.name: Samsara
data.desc: Monster Cards Tributed for a Ritual Summon are returned to the owner's Deck instead of being sent to the Graveyard.

data.name: Sand Moth
data.desc: When this face-down Defense Position card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, except by battle, switch the original ATK and DEF of this card and Special Summon it.

data.name: Silent Insect
data.desc: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned. Negate the effects of all Continuous Spell Cards and Continuous Trap Cards.

data.name: Success Probability 0%
data.desc: Send 2 random Fusion Monsters from your opponent's Extra Deck to the Graveyard.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Super Junior Confrontation
data.desc: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. Negate the battle, and 1 monster with the lowest ATK in face-up Attack Position your opponent controls battles against 1 monster with the lowest DEF in face-up Defense Position you control. After that battle, end the Battle Phase.

data.name: Symbol of Heritage
data.desc: Activate only while there are 3 Monster Cards with the same name in your Graveyard. Select 1 of those monsters, Special Summon it, and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

data.name: Tenkabito Shien
data.desc: This card is unaffected by the effects of Trap Cards.

data.name: Treeborn Frog
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard and you do not control "Treeborn Frog": You can Special Summon this card. You must control no Spell/Trap Cards to activate and to resolve this effect.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Trial of the Princesses
data.desc: Equip only to "White Magician Pikeru" or "Ebon Magician Curran"; it gains 800 ATK. During a turn that the equipped monster destroyed a Level 5 or higher monster by battle, you can Tribute the equipped monster and this card to Special Summon from your hand or Deck: 1 "Princess Pikeru" if you Tributed "White Magician Pikeru", or 1 "Princess Curran" if you Tributed "Ebon Magician Curran".

data.name: Uria, Lord of Searing Flames
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 face-up Trap Cards you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 1000 ATK for each Continuous Trap Card in your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can target 1 Set Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target. Neither player can activate Spell/Trap Cards in response to this effect's activation.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years
